title: Why I Chose ML/AI
description: Inspired by Daniel Bourke’s article “6-Step Framework to Tackle Machine Learning Projects”, I decided to analyze the process of building ML solutions step by step. By examining each stage, I show which skills are most important – and why they motivated me to develop in this area.

title: SMS Spam Detector App
description:
The application runs on AWS EC2 inside a Docker container, with the image hosted in Amazon ECR. The model is trained on the Kaggle SMS Spam Collection Dataset.
Usage: type a message in English, e.g., 'You win a new phone', and click the 'Check' button.

title: Hate Speech Detector App
description:
The application runs on AWS EC2 inside a Docker container, with the image hosted in Amazon ECR. The model is trained on the Kaggle Hate Speech and Offensive Language Dataset.
Usage: type a message in English, e.g., 'We will fight against him.', and click the 'Sprawdź tekst' button.

title: Comparison of Ensemble Boosting Algorithms
description: Google Colab Notebook – Comparison of the performance of five different Ensemble Boosting algorithms: XGBoost, CatBoost, AdaBoost, GBM, LightGBM

title: CNN - Computer Vision
description: Google Colab Notebook – Convolutional Neural Networks – the model checks whether the image contains a Steak or Pizza. Implementation of a Tiny VGG model using TensorFlow.
